alert.note: Alert for Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 06 at 8:51AM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... YellowJacket Creek near Hogansville affecting Troup County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...YellowJacket Creek near Hogansville. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 8 feet, Minor flooding begins of the marshy wetlands and woods along the creek upstream and downstream from the stream gage on the Hammett Road bridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:50 AM EDT Wednesday the stage was 7.9 feet and rising. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 8 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
